mdRecord.dcterms:title: Washington Society: you are respectfully invited to attend the valedictory oration of the Washington Society of the University of Virginia, to be delivered by Mr. Wm. B. Newton, of Westmoreland County, Va., in the chapel on Saturday the 26th, inst. at 8 o'clock P.M.

You are respectfully invited to attend the valedictory oration of the Washington Society of the University of Virginia, to be delivered by Mr. Wm. B. Newton, of Westmoreland County, Va., in the chapel on Saturday the 26th, inst. at 8 o'clock P.M
